info.name: Horizon 2006 (8.0) REST API
info.description:
REST API for VMware Horizon 2006 (8.0)

Documented here: https://code.vmware.com/apis/919/view-rest-api

Enter the following on the Variables Tab:

	Horizon Server FQDN
	
	Username
	
	Password
	
	Domain

Usage:

Enter the variables, click update then run the Login request to get the JSON Web Token - you can now run the other requests in the collection until the JWT expires.

Chris Halstead
chalstead@vmware.com
@chrisdhalstead

item.name: Get IC Domain Account by ID
Creates one or more image management assets. Each of the index of result in the response, correspond to the index of the original asset.
Creates one or more image management streams. Each of the index of result in the response, correspond to the index of the original stream
Creates one or more image management tags. Each of the index of result in the response, correspond to the index of the original tag.
Creates one or more image management versions.

request.description: Creates one or more image management versions. Each of the index of result in the response, correspond to the index of the original version.

item.name: Lists RCX servers of the cluster

body.raw:
{
  "feature_settings": {
    "cloud_managed": true
  },
  "general_settings": {
    "application_sso_timeout_minutes": 30,
    "application_sso_timeout_policy": "ENABLED",
    "block_restricted_clients": false,
    "client_idle_session_timeout_minutes": 300,
    "client_idle_session_timeout_policy": "NEVER",
    "client_max_session_timeout_minutes": 300,
    "client_max_session_timeout_policy": "TIMEOUT_AFTER",
    "client_session_timeout_minutes": 300,
    "console_session_timeout_minutes": 30,
    "display_pre_login_message": false,
    "display_warning_before_forced_logoff": true,
    "enable_automatic_status_updates": true,
    "enable_credential_cleanup_for_htmlaccess": false,
    "enable_multi_factor_re_authentication": false,
    "enable_sending_domain_list": false,
    "enable_server_in_single_user_mode": true,
    "forced_logoff_message": "The system will shut down shortly. Please save your work.",
    "forced_logoff_timeout_minutes": 3,
    "hide_domain_list_in_client": true,
    "hide_server_information_in_client": false,
    "machine_sso_timeout_minutes": 300,
    "machine_sso_timeout_policy": "DISABLED_AFTER",
    "pre_login_message": "Disclaimer : This server is being monitored for suspicious activity.",
    "restricted_client_data": [
      {
        "type": "WINDOWS",
        "version": "string"
      }
    ],
    "restricted_client_message": "The system does not support this version of the Horizon client.",
    "store_cal_on_client": false,
    "store_cal_on_connection_server": false
  },
  "security_settings": {
    "message_security_mode": "ENABLED",
    "re_auth_secure_tunnel_after_interruption": true,
    "recovery_password": "string",
    "recovery_password_hint": "password hint"
  }
}

item.name: Create bulk entitlements for a set of application pools
Delete bulk entitlements for a set of application pools
List Entitlements for a given Application Pools
List Entitlements for all Desktop Pools
Create bulk Entitlements for a set of Desktop Pools
Delete bulk Entitlements for a set of Desktop Pools
Returns the IDs of users or groups entitled to a given desktop pool.
Lists AD users or groups information

query.description: true returns only groups, false returns only users - remove the parameter to return all

request.description:
This API supports Pagination and Filters.
For Pagination, optional query params of 'page' and 'size' needs to be send.
For Filters, refer to 'ADUserOrGroupSummary' model description to find supported filters on specific field.
For full information on using Filters, refer to 'Getting Started' guide of 'VMware Horizon Server API' in code.vmware.com

item.name: Lists all the VM snapshots from the vCenter for a given VM

request.description: Lists all the VMs from a vCenter or a datacenter in that vCenter which may be suitable as snapshots for instant/linked clone desktop or farm creation.

request.description: Lists all the VM templates from a vCenter or a datacenter for the given vCenter which may be suitable for full clone desktop pool creation

request.description:
This API supports Pagination and Filters.
For Pagination, optional query params of page and size need to be sent.
For Filters, refer to MachineInfo model description to find supported filters on specific field.
For full information on using Filters, refer to Horizon Server REST Pagination and Filter Guide of VMware Horizon Server API in code.vmware.com
